Articles.Content:
Hi if anyone play with Rss in realistic mod please help me

For exemple with RSS the FASA Saturn V can't escape to hearth gravity.

In 0.90 ISP scaller difficulty mod can resolve this problem but how in 1.0.4

Thanks a lot
Most people go with the full realism overhaul. Procedural parts and RealFuels will enable you to produce rockets with similar performance to real rockets.

Moved this mod-related question over to General Add-on Affairs.

As Jimbimbibble mentions, you need Realism Overhaul, or at least RealFuels, to simulate real world performance. KSP parts are heavy compared to real life to make it a bit more difficult to get to orbit around tiny Kerbin, if you rescale the planet without adjusting those masses then Earth orbit becomes about as difficult as an Eve ascent.

Edited September 22, 2015 by Red Iron Crown
Typo
For RealFuels what do you use ? Any tuto for explain what is the best ?
Also, in 0.90 Isp influenced fuel consumption, but since 1.0 it changes thrust: lower Isp means lower thrust. So, asl, your rocket might not have enoguh thrust to take off anymore.
